Create a column definition for use with the create column method for SharePoint lists

Source: R/sp_column_definition.R
create_column_definition.Rd

create_column_definition() builds a named list with the properties of the columnDefinition resource type.

Usage

create_column_definition(
  name,
  ...,
  .col_type = "text",
  enforce_unique = NULL,
  hidden = FALSE,
  deletable = NULL,
  indexed = NULL,
  sealed = NULL,
  propagate_changes = NULL,
  read_only = NULL,
  required = NULL,
  validation = NULL,
  default = get_column_default(),
  description = NULL,
  displayname = NULL,
  id = NULL
)

create_text_column(
  name,
  ...,
  multiple_lines = NULL,
  append_changes = NULL,
  lines = NULL,
  max_length = NULL,
  text_type = c("plain", "richText")
)

create_choice_column(
  name,
  choices,
  ...,
  allow_text = TRUE,
  display_as = c("checkBoxes", "dropDownMenu", "radioButtons")
)

create_number_column(
  name,
  ...,
  decimals = "automatic",
  display_as = NULL,
  max = NULL,
  min = NULL
)

create_datetime_column(
  name,
  ...,
  display_as = c("default", "friendly", "standard"),
  format = c("dateOnly", "dateTime")
)

create_boolean_column(name, ...)

create_currency_column(name, ..., locale = "en-us")

create_calculated_column(
  name,
  ...,
  formula,
  format = NULL,
  output_type = c("boolean", "currency", "dateTime", "number", "text")
)

Details

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/columndefinition?view=graph-rest-1.0
